circumstances: Just after takeoff from Morganfield, while climbing, the airplane stalled and crashed in a field. The aircraft was destroyed and both occupants have been killed. The crew was completing a local test flight after a paraplegic rudder control device was installed on the left rudder pedal.
probable_cause:
Stall after the pilot failed to follow approved procedures. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Simulated conditions, 
- Unapproved modification, 
- Interference with flight controls, 
- Right engine magneto switch in OFF position.
